title: The sermo[n] of doctor Colete, made to the conuocacion at Paulis
author: Colet, John, 1467?-1519.
publisher: Thomas Berthelet regius impressor excudebat. Cum priuilegio,
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
A translation of: Oratio habita a D. Ioanne Colet ad clerum in convocatione (STC 5545).
Sermon preached at opening of a convocation of the province of Canterbury, summoned 6 February 1512, concerning the reformation of ecclesiastical affairs--MiU.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
